document.full_text: american teenager juan agudelo pounced on a rare defensive mistake from argentina to earn the united states a 1-1 draw in a friendly international at the new meadowlands stadium on saturday.
document.title: u.s. survive messi's masterclass to draw with argentina
lines_and_colors: american teenager juan agudelo pounced on a rare defensive mistake from argentina to earn the united states a 1-1 draw in a friendly international at the new meadowlands stadium on saturday.
